name: ByteMatchSet
description: The AWS::WAF::ByteMatchSet resource creates an AWS WAF ByteMatchSet that identifies a part of a web request that you want to inspect. For more information, see CreateByteMatchSet in the AWS WAF API Reference.

properties.name: ByteMatchTuples
properties.description: Settings for the ByteMatchSet, such as the bytes (typically a string that corresponds with ASCII characters) that you want AWS WAF to search for in web requests.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: A friendly name or description of the ByteMatchSet.
